adjectives.description: assimilationist (comparative more assimilationist, superlative most assimilationist)

entries.meaning: (sociology) Of or pertaining to assimilationism; promoting or advocating assimilationism.
(sociology) An advocate of the policy or practice of the assimilation of immigrant or other minority cultures into a mainstream culture.
examples: Spanish-language education is not favored by assimilationist parents of Latino children in the US.
